mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.gxdm AS "university.gxdm", university.gxmc AS "university.gxmc", a.zydm AS "specialityManage.zydm", specialityManage.zymc AS "specialityManage.zymc", a.psfy AS "psfy"
LEFT JOIN t_university_c university ON university.gxdm = a.gxdm LEFT JOIN t_speciality_c specialityManage ON specialityManage.zydm = a.zydm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cost_c( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, gxdm, zydm, psfy ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{university.gxdm}, #{specialityManage.zydm}, #{psfy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_cost_c SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, gxdm = #{university.gxdm}, zydm = #{specialityManage.zydm}, psfy = #{psfy} WHERE id = #{id}
